mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (userid, password, name, nickname, phone, email, birth, gender, address) VALUES ( #{userid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{address} )

INSERT INTO users (userid, password, name, nickname, phone, email, birth, gender, address, account, license) VALUES ( #{userid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{account}, #{license} )
